DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare first urge , strong urge , maximum capacity , perception discomfort urodynamic testing room temperature body temperate saline . Twenty-four non-pregnant female refer urogynecology clinic bladder test enrol study . Each patient serve control , undergo bladder test room temperature body temperature saline .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Body Room Temperature Saline Urodynamics
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective observational study . Patient schedule undergo evaluation urinary incontinence urodynamics gynecology clinic ask participate . Patients counsel consent form sign . The nurse open envelope randomize order instillation set first fluid . Normal saline 1000ml bag use instillation . The bag use body temperature fluid heat use Olympic Warmette 98 99 degree determine 3M Tempadot Thermometers . Urodynamics perform use standard clinic protocol record first sensation , first urge , maximum capacity . The patient ask comment discomfort test use 5 point Lickert scale pain urgency ( see attach question ) . Patients allow void . The bladder fill second solution identical question use determine first sensation , first urge maximum capacity . During fill patient test stress incontinence 200 300 ml per protocol . Following instillation second solution patient ask perception pain urgency identical scale . Maximum bladder capacity temperature saline test compare maximum bladder capacity estimate patient â€™ bladder diary . The patient manage appropriate test result .
DOC.criteria: Females refer gynecology clinic urodynamics evaluation appropriate indication bladder test Male subject pregnant female
